summary: Provides a suite of fast unit tests for the ControlNet diffusion pipeline, validating core functionalities such as attention slicing, low‑cost model behavior, custom timestep handling, batch inference consistency, IP‑adapter integration, and xformers‑based attention using dummy components and inputs.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and efficiency of the ControlNet pipeline during development and continuous integration, enabling rapid detection of regressions and performance issues.
